channel.title: Major problems with duel arena
channel.description: Hey guys, whenever I tele to my duel arena, you can't walk anywhere, you're frozen, how do I fix that? The dueling part works but whenever your in there you cant walk anywhere unless you click attack then you will run to your opponent and attack them but you can't move from there. And last but not least, whenever you win a duel, you're stuck in the duel arena only the loser gets out, anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Major problems with duel arena
item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

You need to rewrite that hole thing I don’t know how to do so but yea…

Read full topic

Hey guys, whenever I tele to my duel arena, you can’t walk anywhere, you’re frozen, how do I fix that?
